vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Halff Associates, Inc. for the engineering design of the Five Mile Infrastructure Improvements Project - Project 2 for Tracy Road, from Givendale Road to Persimmon Road - Not to exceed $354,791.00 - Financing: Community Development Block Grant Fund ($295,041.00),  Water Capital Improvement F Fund ($29,875.00), and Wastewater Capital Improvement G Fund ($29,875.00)
